剒字的基本解释

剒
cuò
古同“错”，琢磨；雕刻。
斩，割：“刳肝剒趾。”

剒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuò］
［《廣韻》倉各切，入鐸，清。］
(1)斩杀；割。
(2)琢磨，雕刻打磨。

剒字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页140第30
【唐韻】【集韻】倉各切【韻會】淸各切【正韻】七各切，?音錯。【爾雅·釋器】犀謂之剒。【註】治樸之名。【疏】治其樸，俱未成器也。【玉篇】亦作錯。

剒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
剒字的起名意思

暂无。

剒
Basic explanation of words
剒
cuò
Gu Tong "wrong", pondering; carving.
Cut, cut: "Kill the liver and cut the toes."
剒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuò]
["Guangyun" Cangdi cuts, enters duo, Qing. ]
(1) Beheaded; cut.
(2) Pondering, carving and polishing.
剒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剒; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 140 30
[Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Cangge cuts [Yunhui] Chess cuts [Zhengyun] Seven cuts, wrong sound. [Erya·Release Device] The rhinoceros is called 剒. [Note] The name of Zhipu. [Sparse] To treat its simplicity, it is not a tool. [Jade articles] also made a mistake.

Name meaning
Nothing.

гл. * рубить, отрубать, отсекать
